Fields: 
Link name from EKS.net
Item name in  Zotero (Zotero gets from remote site)
Index file name in Zotero folder
Folder name in Zotero library 
URL for archived site as it will appear in EKS.net

abbreviated as:
Link:   
Item:   
Index:  
Folder: 
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/resources/links/obits//  [modify as necessary]

Link:   Toronto Star
Item:   Eve Kosofsky Sedgwick is survived by her husband Hal, whom she married in 1969. But she was not "straight." To her, nobody was. The concepts of heterosexuality and homosexuality were mere constructs.
Index:  the_woman_who_wrote_how_to_bring_your_kids_up_gay.html
